羈.definition: bridle; halter; to restrain; to detain; to lodge; inn

羈宦.definition: (literary) to serve as a government official far from one's native place

羈押.definition: to detain; to take into custody; detention; imprisonment

羈旅.definition: (literary) to stay long in a place far from home; (literary) person who lives in an alien land

羈絆.definition: trammels; fetters; yoke; to restrain; to hinder; restraint
